description: This file defines a utility function for creating a pagination envelope, which standardizes the structure of paginated API responses. It includes import statements, a single function, and documentation, indicating it is part of a backend API utility module.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] pagination_envelope( items: Union[Sequence[Any], Iterable[Any]], total: int, limit: int, offset: int, )
methods.description: Creates a standardized pagination response dictionary for list endpoints, accepting items, total count, limit, and offset, and returning a dict with these values included.

ctags.name: pagination_envelope
ctags.signature: ( items: Union[Sequence[Any], Iterable[Any]], total: int, limit: int, offset: int, )
